name: NextCart – E-commerce Platform
desc: Full-stack e-commerce web app with product catalog, cart management, and order placement. Implemented Firebase Auth for secure login, Neon DB for product & order storage, and Cloudinary for product image uploads.

name: NovaCare – Doctor Appointment System
desc: Healthcare platform enabling patients to register/login, search doctors by specialization, and book appointments. Doctors can update their profiles and images stored via Cloudinary. Backend built with Spring Boot & Neon DB, secured with Firebase Authentication.

name: Smartshelf – Library Management App
desc: Full-stack system to manage books, members, and borrow/return transactions. Built with JWT-based authentication, REST APIs for CRUD operations, and MySQL for persistence. Designed a responsive frontend with React and Tailwind CSS.
